thread.title: Man United news: Radamel Falcao scores double versus Man City – and fans want Jose Mourinho to re-sign him | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man United news: Radamel Falcao scores double versus Man City – and fans want Jose Mourinho to re-sign him | Metro News

author: Tom Olver For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man United news: Radamel Falcao scores double versus Man City – and fans want Jose Mourinho to re-sign him | Metro News
text:
Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 21 Feb 2017 9:26 pm Radamel Falcao scored a brace against Manchester City (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester United fans were begging Jose Mourinho to bring Radamel Falcao back to Old Trafford after his sensational double for Monaco against Manchester City on Tuesday evening. Arsenal fans BEG Wenger to sign Kylian Mbappe after hailing him the 'new Henry' 
Falcao struggled in his one season with the Red Devils, scoring just four goals in 29 appearances, but the 31-year-old has revived his career in France. 
The Colombian forward was on fire in Monaco’s Champions League tie at the Etihad and found the net either side of the break against Pep Guardiola’s shaky defence. 
Incredibly, Falcao scored as many goals in Manchester on the night as he managed in his entire season with the club in 2014/15. Radamel Falcao had an underwhelming spell at Old Trafford (Picture: Getty) 
City, though, would have known it wouldn’t be an easy night up against Falcao and his strike-partner Kylian Mbappe who have both had terrific seasons in Ligue 1. 
Falcao, in particular, has scored 22 goals in 28 appearances for Monaco this term. 
And United supporters want him back… Can we try again with Falcao on loan? #mufc 
— Chris Scruton (@inaminute23) February 21, 2017 Can we have this Falcao? #MUFC #MCIASM
